activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10470
activity.text:
Hello team, I would love to contribute and work for Diet Management in CARE as it matches well with my technical expertise . I have great experience working with react js, next js by making multiple projects both personal as well as for several hackathons including national level hackathon . I have worked on a similar project where patient's data  is recorded , their meal plan is recorded and tracked . The food reaches to their bed numbers by various delivery partners whose information is also stored. 
I can also include feature like notification sending whenever patient needs something or inventory gets empty and on the timings of their meal.
I am looking forward to make a user friendly , interactive website with best user experience .
Looking forward to collaborate and make things happen .
Thankyou
